tool_description: Find game servers for any of the supported games
name: GameFinder
title: GameFinder

api_list.name: Server Info_copy

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: IP Address or URL of an eco server

required_parameters.name: port
required_parameters.description: Web Port of the specified server.

api_list.name: Server Info

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: IP Address or URL of an eco server

required_parameters.name: webport
required_parameters.description: Web Port of the specified server.

api_list.name: Factorio - Servers Online
api_list.description: Get a list of all online factorio servers.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gamefinder.p.rapidapi.com/factorio/games"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gamefinder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gamefinder.p.rapidapi.com/factorio/games"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gamefinder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Factorio - Server Details
api_list.description: Get details about a specific server.
